title: Jimmy Zhong Arrest Details Revealed in New Report
description: Zhong is now serving a one-year sentence related to the theft of bitcoin from the Silk Road marketplace.

title: Taproot Assets launches on Bitcoin, introducing tokenized asset capabilities to the network
description:
Lighting Labs has announced the mainnet alpha of the Taproot Assets daemon, providing the network with the capacity to hold tokenized assets. This release offers a comprehensive developer experience for issuing, managing, and exploring stablecoins and other assets on the Bitcoin (BTC) blockchain, according to a post by the director of business development at Lightning […]

The post Taproot Assets launches on Bitcoin, introducing tokenized asset capabilities to the network appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Elizabeth Warren and 100 Lawmakers Push Biden on Crypto-Terrorism Action, Despite Less Than 1% Illicit Use
description: Elizabeth Warren, the Democratic senator from Massachusetts, is alarmed by the potential of crypto-fueled terrorism. She has rallied over 100 policymakers and approached the Biden administration, urging the executive branch to tackle this pressing issue. The news follows Warren’s recently introduced “Digital Asset Anti-Money Laundering Act.” Warren Leads Charge Against Crypto’s Role in Terrorism; Seeks […]

title: Roblox calls XRP crypto payments support “inaccurate”
description: The crypto world is an ever-evolving space that has faced various events leading to the development of blockchain technology. However, news reports have always affected the digital market, and the latest report by Roblox has concluded on the XRP token support claims in the platform.  Roblox is not adding Ripple’s XRP token despite the rumors ... title: SBF dined with Eric Adams at the NYC Mayor’s go-to Italian restaurant
description: Sam Bankman-Fried, commonly known as SBF, has been on the radar amidst the lawsuit against him. According to the FBI trial testimony, SBF was scheduled to meet up with the New York City governor, Kathy Hochul. Additionally, reports prove that SBF had links with the NYC Mayor, Eric Adams.  Reports have it that the Mayor ... Read more

title: Basel Committee introduces draft guidelines on crypto asset disclosure
description: The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision has proposed standardized disclosure templates for major banking institutions regarding their crypto asset exposure, aiming for implementation by 2025.

title: TRON’s Explosive Growth: Surpasses 6.5 Billion Transactions and 2.9 Million Smart Contracts in Milestone Achievement
description: Data shows that the Tron network has been enjoying an average of 5 million daily transactions, deployed over 2.9 million in smart contracts and the number of accounts peaked at 190 million. Tron’s TRX is poised to rally coming off a bullish week that has seen it add nearly 5 percent and climb to the [...]
